&&3Beds&&r allow you to &&dsleep through the night&&r, if you're tired enough, and &&dset your spawn point&&r in case you die.
&&dTo check your Tiredness&&r, hover over the "ZZZ" symbol in your inventory.
You cannot sleep unless you have &&6100% Tiredness.&&r
After successfully sleeping, your Tiredness will be reset to 0%.
When your tiredness level reaches 300%, Phantoms have a chance to spawn on you.
As your tiredness level increases, more Phantoms will spawn at once.
The maximum level of Tiredness is 500%.
You can brew two types of potions to help you manage your sleep schedule.
&&eLiveliness Potions&&r will decrease your Tiredness gain by 0.5x per potion level.
Liveliness Potions can be brewed with an Awkward Potion and a Honeycomb. Check REI!
&&eDrowsiness Potions&&r will increase your Tiredness gain by 2x per potion level.
Drowsiness Potions can be brewed by corrupting a Liveliness Potion with a Fermented Spider Eye. Check REI!
